    BiocReporting tools

    Vincent J. Carey, stvjc at channing.harvard.edu

    October 10, 2022

    BiocReporting.Rmd

    Introduction

    This package collects tools for reporting open data about Bioconductor assets and distribution activities.

    Support site usage 

    library(BiocReporting)
get_support_site_stats()
    ## Bioconductor support site usage increments.
##   From 2021/01/01 to 2021/12/31 : 
##    Users added: 3951; Top-level posts added: 2037
##    Questions added: 1899; answers/comments added: 5230

    Download statistics

    Relative to previous reports, this is more fine-grained.

    pls = summarize_software_downloads()
pls$ipplot

    ggplotly(pls$dlplot)
